summary: The original (not Dissidia model) Ultima Weapon from Final Fantasy 7
descriptionHtml:
The original (not Dissidia model) Ultima Weapon from Final Fantasy 7.

A few notes:
There are two versions, 1 handed version and 2 handed version. Each of them have two different glows you can pick from. There is a standard white glow, and then a dark blue glow (when Cloud is low on HP, the blade glows blue) you can pick. The glow is only visible at night/in shadowed areas, the blade in the day time is transparent.

If you have any questions, bug or glitch reports, leave it in the comments or contact me.

INSTALL:
Open the rar, and pick which version you want (two handed or one handed)
then pick the glow color you want. Open the folder of the selected color choice, and drag those contents into your Skyrim\\Data folder. Make sure you enable ESP with Skyrim\'s Launcher.
Just delete those files if you want to uninstall.

Two ways to obtain this sword;
Crafting [Categories -> Misc]

or in console type;
help \"ultima weapon\" 4 (an ID should pop up)
player.additem <type ID here> 1

Enjoy!
~Arky
author: ArkAngel114
